page.title: 21HMS Ganges
page.content:
HMS Ganges is now deserted, it has stood empty and unused for nearly ten years. There have been proposals to develop it as a residential estate but the infrastructure of Shotley village and Shotley Gate will not support it.

So now it stands unused, the mast is still there and has a protection order on it so the owners are required to protect it as a historic monument although some 20 feet have broken off the top. The site looks very sad and sorry now and it's a real pity that a site of genuine Military and Historic interest that could have been a local resource is simply being allowed to moulder away.
Colin S
